tagline: We don't want or need your cookies.
description:
We only use [Plausible Analytics](https://plausible.io/) for statistics purposes and do not use any cookies or collect personal information.

You can read more about how Plausible collects analytics [on their official website](https://plausible.io/data-policy).

However, pages that include iframes like YouTube embeds may use additional trackers. By visiting these pages you agree to [YouTube's privacy policy](https://support.google.com/youtube/answer/10364219).
